author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

While chasing a red herring in the context of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47750 I ended up extending the tests of validated plugins towards untracked parameters.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1385

#### PR validation:

Added unit tests succeed.
title: Extend validated plugin testing
